overview: Documentary with unprecedented access to the construction of the Royal Navy's newest destroyer, the ¬£1billion HMS Daring, Britain's first new warship for 25 years. The program follows the process of building the vessel in three different locations with the latest techniques and testing its vast array of weapons. Maritime experts discuss the significance of the ship to the UK's defences, and cameras go behind the scenes on the official launch that brings royalty to Glasgow.
title: Building Britain's Ultimate Warship
